channel.title: CVE Feed for BIG-IP -- BIG-IP (LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, Edge Gateway, FPS, GTM, Link Controller, PEM, WebAccelerator)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BIG-IP -- BIG-IP (LTM, AAM, AFM, Analytics, APM, ASM, DNS, Edge Gateway, FPS, GTM, Link Controller, PEM, WebAccelerator)

item.title: CVE-2019-6603|2024-08-04T20:23:22.270Z -- big-ip -- big-ip%20%28ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20fps%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%29
item.description: In BIG-IP 11.5.1-11.5.8, 11.6.1-11.6.3, 12.1.0-12.1.3, and 13.0.0-13.0.1, malformed TCP packets sent to a self IP address or a FastL4 virtual server may cause an interruption of service. The control plane is not exposed to this issue. This issue impacts the data plane virtual servers and self IPs.

item.title: CVE-2019-6608|2024-08-04T20:23:22.054Z -- big-ip -- big-ip%20%28ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20fps%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%29
item.description: On BIG-IP 11.5.1-11.6.3, 12.1.0-12.1.3, 13.0.0-13.1.1.1, and 14.0.0-14.0.0.2, under certain conditions, the snmpd daemon may leak memory on a multi-blade BIG-IP vCMP guest when processing authorized SNMP requests.

item.title: CVE-2019-6602|2024-08-04T20:23:22.112Z -- big-ip -- big-ip%20%28ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20fps%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%29
item.description: In BIG-IP 11.5.1-11.5.8 and 11.6.1-11.6.3, the Configuration Utility login page may not follow best security practices when handling a malicious request.

item.title: CVE-2019-6604|2024-08-04T20:23:22.056Z -- big-ip -- big-ip%20%28ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20fps%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%29
item.description: On BIG-IP 11.5.1-11.5.8, 11.6.1-11.6.3, 12.1.0-12.1.3.6, 13.0.0-13.1.1.1, and 14.0.0-14.0.0.2, under certain conditions, hardware systems with a High-Speed Bridge and using non-default Layer 2 forwarding configurations may experience a lockup of the High-Speed Bridge.

item.title: CVE-2019-6606|2024-08-04T20:23:22.214Z -- big-ip -- big-ip%20%28ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20fps%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%29
item.description: On BIG-IP 11.5.1-11.6.3.4, 12.1.0-12.1.3.7, 13.0.0-13.1.1.3, and 14.0.0-14.0.0.2, when processing certain SNMP requests with a request-id of 0, the snmpd process may leak a small amount of memory.

item.title: CVE-2019-6605|2024-08-04T20:23:22.106Z -- big-ip -- big-ip%20%28ltm%2C%20aam%2C%20afm%2C%20analytics%2C%20apm%2C%20asm%2C%20dns%2C%20edge%20gateway%2C%20fps%2C%20gtm%2C%20link%20controller%2C%20pem%2C%20webaccelerator%29
item.description: On BIG-IP 11.5.1-11.5.8, 11.6.1-11.6.3, and 12.0.x, an undisclosed sequence of packets received by an SSL virtual server and processed by an associated Client SSL or Server SSL profile may cause a denial of service.
